title: Wedding Ceremony
description: The main event where the couple exchanges vows and officially becomes married in the presence of family and friends.

title: Reception Dinner
description: A celebratory meal and party held after the wedding ceremony, where guests gather to enjoy food, drinks, and entertainment.

title: Engagement Party
description: A pre-wedding celebration to announce and celebrate the engagement of the couple, typically held shortly after the proposal.

title: Bridal Shower
description: A gathering hosted for the bride before the wedding, where she receives gifts and enjoys the company of her female friends and family.

title: Bachelorette Party
description: A fun and often adventurous party for the bride and her female friends, typically held shortly before the wedding as a last hurrah before marriage.

title: Rehearsal Dinner
description: A dinner held the night before the wedding, where the wedding party, close family members, and friends come together to rehearse and celebrate in a more intimate setting.
